title: Zetwerk Manufacturing bags NTPCâ€™s Rs 2,500-crore PV modules supply contract
description: Zetwerk Manufacturing has secured a 1,515 MWp order from NTPC for ALMM-compliant solar photovoltaic modules, including spares for the 1,200 MW Khavda solar project in Gujarat. The contract is estimated to be worth Rs 2,500 crore. Zetwerk aims to complete the order in 210 days, aligning with India's vision of promoting domestic manufacturing.
